catalog_info.title: Inheritance and Weird Stuff
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Primarily for first-year graduate students, but is open to medical students and advanced undergraduates. A basic understanding of genetics recommended.
catalog_info.description: Focus on patterns of inheritance, including those that were once considered extraordinary but are now recognized as paradigms spanning fungi to humans. Expectations: questions, ideas, conversation during class. No tests, problem sets, or papers.
